name: Maghreb Isha Space LP
description: Meditations on Time, Love & Unity, Yusuf 'Yoshi' Misdaq's 3rd solo LP departs dramatically from his previously heralded hip-hop roots, embracing a serenely warm, organic world-folk sound (with occasional hip-hop detours into galaxies that can only be described as very neardistant). Surprising, fresh and soulful: as only Yoshi can... Also available via Amazon & iTunes (May 2011) Watch the videos: Dawn Song Song of Delicious Affirmation (Dream #2) These are highly limited edition. Each package was hand-made and prayed upon by the artist in March of 2010. They remain eager to be sent forth into your world. Like the music they contain, they are searchers, looking for home. Made With Love (a behind the scenes look into the packaging)
